data.lyric:
[ti:Medicine]
[ar:Queen Naija]
[al:Medicine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Medicine - Queen Naija
[00:16.81]You tell me you love me
[00:18.42]But I ain't been feeling it lately
[00:20.40]You say you love keeping me fly but
[00:22.44]Can't keep me from looking so crazy
[00:24.01]
[00:24.66]Come in at 6 in the morning
[00:26.74]Where you been where you been
[00:28.31]
[00:28.83]Who is that texting your phone
[00:30.77]Just a friend just a friend okay
[00:33.21]
[00:34.35]My intuition never lies
[00:35.92]
[00:36.43]There's nothing you can ever hide
[00:38.40]Already got the screenshots
[00:40.61]So there is no need to deny
[00:42.49]You been creeping and freaking and sneaking
[00:44.01]Like you'll never lose me
[00:45.39]
[00:46.01]Steady claiming that everyone know we together
[00:48.16]But you steady choosing
[00:50.00]Swear I cannot win for losing
[00:52.07]I been out here being faithful
[00:54.20]I always got this on lockdown
[00:56.14]But that ain't been keeping us stable
[00:57.92]
[00:58.59]So I guess I know what I gotta do
[01:01.73]Give you a taste of your own medicine hey yeah
[01:06.88]How would you like it if I do the things you do
[01:10.67]Put you on do not disturb and entertain these dudes
[01:14.30]
[01:14.82]I'ma ride him crazy and you'll never have a clue
[01:18.91]Give another guy everything that belongs to you
[01:23.13]I'ma call up Brian I'ma Facetime Ryan
[01:27.16]I'ma text lorenzo I'ma leave you crying
[01:30.86]
[01:31.72]Don't get it twisted I can play this game too
[01:34.89]How would you like it if I did the same to you same to you
[01:39.48]
[01:40.41]You don't like it
[01:41.66]Now you telling me that I should fight it
[01:43.59]Why you be out here playing the victim
[01:45.26]
[01:45.85]When I am the one who been crying
[01:47.89]Why dish it out but can't take it
[01:49.82]I want revenge I can't fake it
[01:52.01]Wanna see the look on your face
[01:53.22]When I drop my clothes and I get naked
[01:56.00]
[01:56.87]Not for you but for him
[01:59.92]
[02:00.70]Now tell me player how does that make you feel
[02:04.82]How could you play me when the love I gave was real
[02:08.20]
[02:08.89]I even took you back and you still had no chill
[02:12.79]Boy you ain't gone ever learn
[02:14.75]Play with fire you get burned
[02:16.84]I don't think you'll understand
[02:19.04]Until I hit you where it hurts
[02:21.34]So I guess I know what I gotta do
[02:24.41]Give you a taste of your own medicine
[02:26.99]
[02:29.63]How would you like it if I do the things you do
[02:33.01]
[02:33.58]Put you on do not disturb and entertain these dudes
[02:37.61]I'ma ride him crazy and you'll never have a clue
[02:41.63]Give another guy everything that belongs to you
[02:46.00]I'ma call up brian I'ma Facetime Ryan
[02:49.92]I'ma text lorenzo I'ma leave you crying
[02:53.64]
[02:54.45]Don't get it twisted I can play this game too
[02:57.62]How would you like it if I did the same to you same to you
[03:01.92]
[03:03.39]All of those tears I cried
[03:07.48]I can't count the lonely nights
[03:11.56]Time and time again I've tried
[03:15.41]So when I turn into a savage boy don't ask me why
[03:19.85]
[03:22.32]Ask me why don't ask me why
[03:28.60]
[03:32.98]Give you a taste of your own medicine
data.trans:
[ti:Medicine]
[ar:Queen Naija]
[al:Medicine]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:16.81]你告诉我你爱我
[00:18.42]但最近我并没有感觉到你的爱
[00:20.40]你说爱让我一直翱翔 但是
[00:22.44]却无法阻止我变得疯狂
[00:24.01]
[00:24.66]早晨六点走进来
[00:26.74]你去哪了 你去哪了
[00:28.31]
[00:28.83]谁在给你手机发短信
[00:30.77]就一个朋友 就一个朋友
[00:33.21]
[00:34.35]我的直觉从不骗我
[00:35.92]
[00:36.43]你什么事都瞒不了我
[00:38.40]我早就截屏了
[00:40.61]所以 没必要抵赖
[00:42.49]你蹑手蹑脚 行为诡异 鬼鬼祟祟
[00:44.01]自以为永远不会失去我
[00:45.39]
[00:46.01]坚定地宣称所有人都知道我们在一起
[00:48.16]但你的选择没有变
[00:50.00]我发誓 我不可能稳赢不输
[00:52.07]我一直在这里 怀着忠诚的心
[00:54.20]我总是紧闭心扉
[00:56.14]但这也没能让我们的关系稳定下来
[00:57.92]
[00:58.59]所以我想我知道该怎么做了
[01:01.73]让你去尝尝自己酿下的苦果
[01:06.88]如果我以其人之道还治其人之身 你会有什么感觉
[01:10.67]让你身临其境 不要打扰也不要取乐于别人
[01:14.30]
[01:14.82]我要跟他一起疯 让你毫无头绪
[01:18.91]把属于你的一切都给另一个人
[01:23.13]我要打电话给布莱恩 我要跟瑞安视频通话
[01:27.16]我要给洛伦佐发短信 我要让你独自哭泣
[01:30.86]
[01:31.72]不要别扭 我也可以玩这种游戏
[01:34.89]如果我以其人之道还治其人之身 你会有什么感觉
[01:39.48]
[01:40.41]你很不爽
[01:41.66]现在 你又跟我说 我应该反抗的
[01:43.59]你为什么要在这里扮演受害者
[01:45.26]
[01:45.85]其实我才是那个一直伤心流泪的人
[01:47.89]为什么做了这些事情 却又不承担后果
[01:49.82]我要报复 我装不下去了
[01:52.01]想看看你脸上的表情
[01:53.22]当我脱下衣服 一丝不挂时
[01:56.00]
[01:56.87]不是为了你 而是为了他
[01:59.92]
[02:00.70]现在 告诉我 花心人 你感觉如何
[02:04.82]我的爱发自真心 你怎么能玩弄我
[02:08.20]
[02:08.89]我甚至带你回到过去 你却无动于衷
[02:12.79]男孩 你从来都不长记性
[02:14.75]你在玩火自焚
[02:16.84]我想你不会明白的
[02:19.04]直到我戳中你的痛处
[02:21.34]所以我想我知道该怎么做了
[02:24.41]让你去尝尝自己酿下的苦果
[02:26.99]
[02:29.63]如果我以其人之道还治其人之身 你会有什么感觉
[02:33.01]
[02:33.58]让你身临其境 不要打扰也不要取乐于别人
[02:37.61]我要跟他一起疯 让你毫无头绪
[02:41.63]把属于你的一切都给另一个人
[02:46.00]我要打电话给布莱恩 我要跟瑞安视频通话
[02:49.92]我要给洛伦佐发短信 我要让你独自哭泣
[02:53.64]
[02:54.45]不要别扭 我也可以玩这种游戏
[02:57.62]如果我以其人之道还治其人之身 你会有什么感觉
[03:01.92]
[03:03.39]我流过的所有眼泪
[03:07.48]我数不清我度过了多少个孤独的夜晚
[03:11.56]我尝试了一次又一次
[03:15.41]所以 如果我变成了一个野蛮人 男孩 不要问我为什么 
[03:19.85]
[03:22.32]问我为什么 不要问我为什么 
[03:28.60]
[03:32.98]让你去尝尝自己酿下的苦果
